Summary: Fire orange to the northwest. Stationary 100 feet off ground.
divs: sighting detailsmy name is joshua . my case worker is ken pfeifer . my dads name is john i live on 254 upper neck r.d pittsgrove nj 08318 . . 10 :45 pm to the north west of my house . as me and my dad john walked up to the street , in front of my house we looked to the west . about 1\2 of a mile down my rode . was a orange ball . it was fire orange . like almost red as of your break lights on your car . it sat still to the north west . for about 15 minutes and 45 seconds at the least . then after that it moved slightly back words and forward . very slowly then moved to the south . then it started to twinkle like a diamond color . all over it . i have steiner german scope . pretty high powered . we looked at it with that .
